text: Læa meux phwk cea hya brrda hying læw nang hela nan di thung kahnd wela khxng phwk nang læw k cng xya khadkhwang phwk nang nı kar thi phwk nang ca tæng kab brrda khukhrxng khxng phwk nang meux phwk khea tang phxcı kan rahwang phwk khea doy chxbthrrm nanhæla khux sing thi ca thuk na ma næana takteuxn kæ phu thi sraththa tx xallxhˌ læa wan prlok nanhæla khux sing thi brisuththi kwa læa saxad kwa sahrab phwk cea læa xallxhˌ nan thrng ru tæ phwk cea miru
